actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to allow time spent on National Guard duty to be counted towards the time a federally recognized National Guard unit is required to spend each year in summer field training.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the military department concerned to count time spent by a National Guard unit on call or order to duty towards the number of required training days for such a unit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 32, United States Code, to allow time spent on National Guard duty to be counted towards the time a federally recognized National Guard unit is required to spend each year in summer field training.
